it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class RMIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.RMIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMIConnHandler, Server, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIServer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Server, RMIConnHandler
    RMI implementation of the server interface, it handles the RMI connections of all the game
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      RMIServer()

      • RMIServer

        RMIServer()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        java.rmi.RemoteException - in case of binding errors

    • Method Detail

      • newConnection

        public void newConnection(java.lang.String registryBind)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                          java.rmi.AlreadyBoundException,
                          java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Remote method invoked by the clients to match with the server. Clients create a bind with their own remote interface, so the server can interact with.
        Specified by:
        newConnection in interface RMIConnHandler
        Parameters:
        registryBind - registry name of the client remote interface
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - in case of binding error
        java.rmi.AlreadyBoundException - in case of already existing binding name
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - If the RMI binding has been unsuccessful

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
        Pops the first object of the waiting connections list, to be retrieved to the main thread
        Specified by:
        getConnection in interface Server
        Returns:
        First available connection
